Class Summary
Archer

AttackEffect  
AttackUnit This class extends the Unit class and is used to send the drawing information for the AttackUnit to its parent Unit class so it can be drawn, and to highlight the tiles that the AttackUnit can move to if it is selected.
Building The class extends the Object, draws the graphics, and opens the openBuildMenu
BuildMenu  
BuildMenuFrame  
Butcher  
Castle  
Dialogue  
Fire  
FireSpirit  
ForestTile This class is used to draw the ForestTile in the location being given, and to return the name of the ForestTiles sound file so it can be played
GameRunner This is the main runner class
GoldMine  
GrassTile This class is used to draw grass tiles in specific locations and return the sound they will make if they are walked across.
HighScore This class returns the arraylist of strings in the form of "name-moves", which has the high-scores added.
Horseman This class, Horseman, extends the AttackUnit.
Knight  
Location This class has the location passed down and creates the coordinates
LogHandling  
Mage The class passes the location for the mage to be drawn and defines calls on its parent to allow the mage to move.
MagesTower  
MagicSpirit  
Main This main menu class presents the main credits page, and calls the loghandling class it also plays this- "src/TLPTheme Song.wav" - during the beginning.
MainMenu  
MainMenuScreen  
Object This Object class passes an image and sets the coordinates for it.
OptionsMenu  
Player This class presents the player to the game along with their name, and the different units that the player has obtained, such as the gold, turn movements, and listens to the time of actions.
PlayerBot  
PlayMenuBuild  
SaveLoad This SaveLoad class receives the user's password and username.
Sound This class handles the sounds portion of the game
StartGame This is the class that starts the actual game
Storm  
Summoner  
SupportUnit This class draws the SupportUnit at the specifed location
Swordsman This class extends the AttackUnit and sets the image file on location loc, and sets the values for the attributes of the Swordsman.
Target  
Tile This abstract class extends the Object.
Unit This Unit class extends the Object and presents the different components of the game, such as health, actionpoints, maxactionpoints etc.
WaterTile This class extend the Tile and loc is recieved/returned and the image does the same.
